mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA (QNA_NO, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_IMAGE, QNA_STATUS, QNA_DATE, QNA_ANSWER, USER_NO) VALUES ( SEQ_QNA_NO.NEXTVAL, #{qna_title}, #{qna_content}, #{qna_image}, 'Y', SYSDATE, 'N', #{user_no} )
mapper.select: SELECT QNA_NO, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_IMAGE, QNA_STATUS, QNA_DATE, QNA_ANSWER, USER_NO FROM QNA WHERE QNA_NO = #{qna_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ANSWER (A_NO, ANSWER_CONTENT, ANSER_DATE, ANSWER_STATUS, QNA_NO) VALUES (SEQ_ANSWER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{answer_content}, SYSDATE, 'Y', #{qna_no})
mapper.select: SELECT QNA_NO, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_IMAGE, QNA_STATUS, QNA_DATE, QNA_ANSWER, USER_NO, A_NO, ANSWER_CONTENT, ANSER_DATE, ANSWER_STATUS, USER_ID FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, QLIST.* FROM (SELECT Q.QNA_NO, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_IMAGE, QNA_STATUS, QNA_DATE, QNA_ANSWER, Q.USER_NO, A_NO, ANSWER_CONTENT, ANSER_DATE, ANSWER_STATUS, USER_ID FROM QNA Q LEFT JOIN ANSWER A ON (Q.QNA_NO = A.QNA_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = Q.USER_NO) WHERE QNA_STATUS = 'Y' AND Q.USER_NO = #{user_no} ORDER BY QNA_DATE DESC) QLIST )WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QNA WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no}

SELECT QNA_NO, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_IMAGE, QNA_STATUS, QNA_DATE, QNA_ANSWER, USER_NO, A_NO, ANSWER_CONTENT, ANSER_DATE, ANSWER_STATUS, USER_ID, USER_NAME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, AQLIST.* FROM (SELECT Q.QNA_NO, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_IMAGE, QNA_STATUS, QNA_DATE, QNA_ANSWER, Q.USER_NO, A_NO, ANSWER_CONTENT, ANSER_DATE, ANSWER_STATUS, USER_ID, M.USER_NAME FROM QNA Q LEFT JOIN ANSWER A ON (Q.QNA_NO = A.QNA_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = Q.USER_NO) WHERE QNA_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY QNA_DATE DESC) AQLIST ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
